text: Karl Jiszda (21 July 1899 – 30 November 1963) was an Austrian football (soccer) player and manager. He played for Floridsdorfer AC, First Vienna FC and Brooklyn Wanderers. July 31, 1921 Karl Jiszda debuted for the Austria national football team against Finland (2-3).Austria – Record International Players – RSSSF He coached Garbarnia Kraków, Floridsdorfer AC, FC Zürich and FC Oerlikon. In 1937 he worked as head coach of the Lithuania national football team.Karl Jiszda – national football team manager ==References and notes== ==External links== * * * Category:1899 births Category:1963 deaths Category:Association football forwards Category:Austrian footballers Category:Austria international footballers Category:First Vienna FC players Category:Austrian football managers Category:Lithuania national football team managers Category:FC Zürich managers Category:Association football defenders
title: Karl Jiszda
